title: Rename primary CTA to PLANS and make Talk to Sales open Discord invite

requirements.text: Rename every visible CTA label that currently displays "Start Free Trial" to "PLANS" using the centralized copy config (frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts) as the single source of truth.

quotes: I want that rename start free trial to PLANS

acceptanceCriteria: In the hero section, the primary CTA button label displays exactly "PLANS".
In the final CTA section (Contact section), the primary CTA button label displays exactly "PLANS".
No other UI element still displays the exact text "Start Free Trial" after the change.
The updated labels come from frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts (not hardcoded in components).

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Talk to Sales" button opens https://discord.gg/NMcBdXYVFe in a new tab/window.
The "Talk to Sales" button remains visible and retains its current styling/variant (outline) and label text.
The implementation uses safe external-link handling (e.g., includes noopener/noreferrer if using window.open or an anchor tag).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Use frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts as the centralized place for landing-page copy updates.
nonGoals: Add Discord login or any Discord OAuth authentication.
Change the site visual theme, layout structure, or section order beyond the requested button label and click behavior.
